page.title: 19NEWS ITEMS ABOUT HARMBY
page.content: TAKEN FROM THE DARLINGTON AND STOCKTON TIMES NEWSPAPER. "AT THE BRING AND BUY SALE HELD RECENTLY IN HARMBY VILLAGE HALL IN AID OF THE LEAGUE OF FRIENDS OF NORTHALLERTON HOSPITAL VENTILATOR LIFE-SUPPORT MACHINE APPEAL,Â£221 WAS RAISED" "FILMING- LAST SUNDAY AND MONDAY INTEREST WAS CENTRED ON THE SCRAPYARD AT THE BOTTOM OF HARMBY VILLAGE WHEN A BBC FILM UNIT WERE FILMING A SCENE FOR THE CHRISTMAS SHOWING OF "ALL CREATURES GREAT AND SMALL" "A 684 CONCERN. A LETTER FROM THE CHAIRMAN OF THE C.P.R.E. OUTLINED CONCERN OVER THE PROPOSED UPGRADING OF THE A684 ROAD WHICH RAN THROUGH THE DALE.HE UNDERSTOOD THAT THE COUNTY COUNCIL WOULD RECEIVE EXTRA CASH FOR MAINTENANCE IF THE ROAD WAS UPGRADED (CONT.PAGE 20)
